message: Let's get started! I'll take the lion's share, but I'll give you a small token of appreciation for being a good sport.
Meet me halfway and let's split it down the middle!
I'm not willing to give up 50% of the remaining value. I'll try to do better than that.
I'll give you a bit more this round, but don't think you're getting the better deal yet!
You're getting a bit greedy, Alice! I'll give you a smaller share this round.
I suppose I was being a bit greedy. This offer isn't bad, considering the circumstances.
